name: 2025 12th International Conference on Mechanics, Materials and Manufacturing
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be reviewed by 2-3 reviewers. Accepted and presented papers in ICMMM 2025 will be published into Conference Proceedings or Journals, as followings: Option A: Submitted papers will be reviewed by 2-3 reviewers. Accepted and presented papers in ICMMM 2025 will be published into Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted for Scopus. Option B: International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research (ISSN: 2278-0149 (Online), Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. (only for papers related to Mechanical and Manufacturing)
